#summary How to run the game with correct files
#labels Phase-Support

= Run the game =

Copy the folder '/data/' from a compiled archive to the folder of the programme.

Copy the REDALERT.mix and MAIN.mix files from original archives of the game into the folder '/data/mix'

and run the programme.

= CD1&2 =

CD1 and CD2 have their own MAIN.MIX
